title: Plat Top LFT
body:
Top lane main, looking for team. Committed to improving as a player. I mainly play tanks, but i'm open to criticism and willing to learn anything to help the team. Have had very little ranked 5's experience or coaching, but like i said, looking to improve.
available 6/7 nights, from 7pm-x. 
Current IGN (Probs changing it soon): TSM SirDiesAlot
